channel.title: Amana on The Compass Rose Band
channel.description: Recent content in Amana on The Compass Rose Band

item.title: Compass Rose at Millstream Brewery
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band at Amana’s Millstream Brewery!

item.title: Compass Rose at Millstream Brewery
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band at Amana’s Millstream Brewery!

item.title: Millstream Brau Haus Halloween Party
item.description: Grab your costumes and head out to the Millstream Brau Haus in Amana, IA featuring the music of the Compass Rose Band! Great food, drinks, and atmosphere in the old authentic German Bierhalle. No cover charge.

item.title: Millstream Brewery
item.description: Free outdoor concert at Iowa’s oldest microbrewery. Bring your lawn chairs, but no coolers please.

item.title: Millstream Brau Haus
item.description: Wear your favorite Halloween costume and join the Compass Rose Band as we play for Millstream Brewery’s Annual Halloween Party at the Millstream Brau Haus!

item.title: Millstream Brewery
item.description: Join the Compass Rose Band for a streetfest at Iowa’s oldest microbrewery, Millstream Brewery, in the world famous Amana Colonies. Bring your friends to taste some of the finest microbrews around and dance like no one is watching!
